response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product embodies innovation, durability, and functionality, making it an unparalleled choice for those seeking superior quality. Given its exceptional features and craftsmanship, we believe its true value exceeds $10,000. For this extraordinary opportunity, I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at an exclusive price of $15,000. This offer not only ensures you acquire a top-tier product but also secures a significant value compared to market prices. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or arrange for a viewing. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this exceptional product into your possession.", "product_price": 15000}
